chapter_reflection.speaker: Narrator
chapter_reflection.text: Elena and Thomas have become regulars at Dragon Haven Cafe - not separately anymore, but together. Their laughter fills the corner booth that once held only Elena's silence.

siblings_together.speaker: Narrator
siblings_together.text: They're rebuilding their relationship one conversation at a time. Some days are harder than others. Old wounds resurface, old arguments flare. But they keep coming back. They keep trying.

elena_visit.speaker: Elena
elena_visit.text: *She approaches you while Thomas orders* I never properly thanked you. When I first came here, I was running from my past. You gave me a place to stop running.

thomas_joins.speaker: Thomas
thomas_joins.text: *He joins them, carrying two cups* And you gave me somewhere to find what I'd lost. *He hands Elena her tea* Our family wasn't broken beyond repair. We just needed... neutral ground.

elena_explains.speaker: Elena
elena_explains.text: This cafe is special. It's not just the food or the dragon. *She looks around* People heal here. They find what they need. That takes a special kind of magic.

choices.text: The magic comes from the people who walk through that door.
I just serve the food. You two did the hard work.

elena_smiles.speaker: Elena
elena_smiles.text: *A genuine smile, no walls, no guards* Perhaps. But you create the space where magic can happen. That's not nothing.

thomas_disagrees.speaker: Thomas
thomas_disagrees.text: *He shakes his head* Don't be modest. You listened when we needed to talk. You stayed quiet when we needed silence. You knew exactly what we needed, even when we didn't.

siblings_gift.speaker: Elena
siblings_gift.text: We've been talking about the future. Thomas is thinking of moving back to the city. *She glances at him* Closer to family.

thomas_nervous.speaker: Thomas
thomas_nervous.text: *Nervous but hopeful* We thought maybe... a joint business. Something to work on together. Rebuild what we lost by building something new.

elena_plans.speaker: Elena
elena_plans.text: A specialty shop. Artisan foods. Family recipes with modern touches. *She looks at you* Inspired by a certain cafe we know.

thomas_request.speaker: Thomas
thomas_request.text: Would you... would you consider being our advisor? Helping us get started? You've built something remarkable here. We'd love to learn from you.

player_final.speaker: You
player_final.text: I'd be honored. Family businesses are built on love - and you two have plenty of that.

chapter_complete.speaker: Narrator
chapter_complete.text: Word spreads of Dragon Haven Cafe - a place where estranged family members find their way back to each other. Where the past can be confronted, forgiven, and laid to rest.

reputation_grows.speaker: Narrator
reputation_grows.text: Elena's Reconciliation Tea and Thomas's Humble Pie join your menu - reminders that even the most broken relationships can be mended with patience, honesty, and love.

chapter_end.speaker: Narrator
chapter_end.text: Chapter 6 - Mending What Was Broken - Complete
